column5: Thank you so much for the information !
I believe so,  makes relationships very hard.  I could quote science but the anger posts in this sub are science enough for me!
I feel all of this 100% yesterday sucked for rage.  Made a fool out of myself in public so humiliated.  Just when I thought I was doing so well.  Glad to have you all who understand truly grateful
Love to you,  I‚Äôm so sorry it‚Äôs been so hard. You are not alone and I know things will get better.  You are stronger than you‚Äôll ever know.

I haven‚Äôt experienced impulsivity,  I actually used to be more impulsive when I wasnt medicated.

But yes 100% on the memory and aphasia issues.  I used to think it was from smoking pot, but I stopped smoking few months ago and still have issues with this.  I saw a post on this sub a while back about memory issues & aphasia being a BP/anxiety symptom.  I‚Äôm sorry I can‚Äôt find the source,  but it may be our disorder and not the medication.  Or perhaps a combo.   


why are there no perfect meds!  If I find the source info I‚Äôll edit this comment !

It‚Äôs like anger fuels more anger and self hatred,  its such a shit cycle to break.  If you fine of anything that works for you I‚Äôd love to hear.  I always hold my breathe the least helpful thing.  I believe in us!!
‚ù§Ô∏è Means a lot thank you I will
That is sage advice thank you so much.

I‚Äôm so sorry about your dad,  can‚Äôt imagine how that situation is to navigate as his child. You deserve a father that is loving.  You‚Äôre right about maybe some things that have been said personally between them I may not know about.

And yes totally agree about the phone!! My bro can be a little shit sometimes too. 

Proud of you for maintaining your life independently and best wishes for you in school!  Very inspirational.

Thank you so much for the advice and positivity. Sounds like our families are similar ie misdirected anger.  Probably the Irish catholic/bottle things up situation going on in my case.

My sister just doesn‚Äôt want to hear when she is wrong, and you‚Äôre right she doesn‚Äôt communicate well or reach out ( unless she needs something. ). She‚Äôs funny and nice to strangers, but will to lift a finger for anyone, physically or emotionally
These are great you should be so proud of yourself.  Art heals and helps all

Whyyyy AND god forbid you let your insurance lapse  bc you‚Äôre not on your meds and have a hard time staying organized!!

I don‚Äôt know if this exists in other cities, but I was able to get in really quickly (without insurance) at a community counseling and legal center.  It was not a health center,  but the counselor was a volunteer and experienced.  She referred me to a prescriber who was also volunteer and this saved my life. 


If you live near Boston message me, and if you don‚Äôt google community low income counseling!

Hello!  I‚Äôm BP2 and lamotrigine is my favorite med I‚Äôve ever been on.  That being said it has a really short half life so don‚Äôt miss a dose and make sure you take it at the same time everyday, as I have had episodes like the second I don‚Äôt take it.  Also if you forget for a while and want to take it again, you have to see the doc and start all over with a low dose, moving up with the higher increments. 

Also if I have a lot of triggers happening at once i still fall apart,  so although lamotrigine is a big help I still have to exercise, sleep a ton, eat well, avoid stress- but like who doesn‚Äôt have to do that to feel happy.

My dear friend wasn‚Äôt successful with it but it didn‚Äôt give her any side effects, just didn‚Äôt work.   I know in high doses around 400mg it can make you feel sick as my mother takes this much for her epilepsy and doesn‚Äôt understand why I prefer this med. (I take 200mg p/day with no other med combos)


After years of taking ssri‚Äôs with no success,  this mood stabilizer was a god send.  I love how it doesn‚Äôt affect my libido.   I really hope it works for you!  Please reach out if you need anything.




TLDR: Less depression, but I still still have some rapid mood cycling.
Thank you I really appreciate it, must be hard to get outbreaks back to back like that  ‚ù§Ô∏è
Thanks so much for the helpful info and kind words! I‚Äôve always dreamed of having this amazing conception sex but that‚Äôs a big fat lol right now.

My outbreaks have never been bad so I didn‚Äôt need it but now that we‚Äôre TTC I think that will be super helpful thanks!  Should‚Äôve thought of it hah ! 

Also mono ?  Really?  So weird

[edit:  just read that article, thank you so so much for informing me, death in a newborn bc of HSV1 I never knew!]
